00024 /* function GetPosteLibelle
00025  * Purpose : Return the label of a poste
00026  * 
00027  * parm : 
00028  *      - p_dossier
00029  *      - p_id tmp_pcmn (pcm_val)
00030  *      - is_cn conneciton
00031  * gen :
00032  *      - none
00033  * return:
00034  *      - string 
00035  *
00036  */ 
00037 function GetPosteLibelle($p_dossier,$p_id,$is_cn=0)
00038 {
00039   include_once("postgres.php");
00040   if ( ! isset($is_cn) ) $is_cn=0;
00041   if ( $is_cn == 0) {
00042     $cn=DbConnect($p_dossier);
00043   } else {
00044     $cn=$p_dossier;
00045   }
00046   $Res=ExecSql($cn,"select pcm_lib from tmp_pcmn where pcm_val=$p_id");
00047   if ( pg_NumRows($Res) == 0) { return "non existing poste";}
00048   $l_poste=pg_fetch_row($Res,0);
00049   return $l_poste[0];
00050 }
00051 /* function GetNumberLine
00052  * Purpose : Max of ligne definie dans le journal
00053  * 
00054  * parm : 
00055  *      - p_dossier
00056  *      - p_jrn
00057  * gen :
00058  *      - none
00059  * return:
00060  *      - 
00061  *
00062  */ 
00063 function GetNumberLine($p_dossier,$p_jrn) 
00064 {
00065   $cn=DbConnect($p_dossier);
00066   $Res=ExecSql($cn,"select jrn_deb_max_line,jrn_cred_max_line from jrn_def where jrn_def_id=$p_jrn");
00067   if ( pg_NumRows($Res) == 0 ) {
00068     echo "<H2 class=\"warning\"> Journal non trouvé </H2>";
00069     //    return (3,3);
00070   }
00071   $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00072   $l_deb=$l_line['jrn_deb_max_line'];
00073   $l_cred=$l_line['jrn_cred_max_line'];
00074   //  return ($l_deb,$l_cred);
00075 
00076 }
00077 /* function PosteForm
00078  * Purpose : Cree un form pour prendre les postes
00079  * 
00080  * parm : 
00081  *      -  connection
00082  * gen :
00083  *      - noen
00084  * return:
00085  *      - morceau de code d'html qui contient un multiselect
00086  *        pour les postes
00087  *
00088  */ 
00089 function PosteForm($p_cn) {
00090   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select pcm_val,pcm_lib from tmp_pcmn 
00091          where pcm_val = any (select j_poste from jrnx) order by pcm_val::text");
00092   $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00093   if ($Max==0) return null;
00094   $ret='<SELECT NAME="poste[]" SIZE="15" MULTIPLE>';
00095   for ( $i = 0;$i< $Max;$i++) {
00096     $line=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00097     $ret.=sprintf('<OPTION VALUE="%s" > %s - %s',
00098                   $line['pcm_val'],
00099                   $line['pcm_val'],
00100                   $line['pcm_lib']);
00101   }//for
00102   $ret.="</SELECT>";
00103   return $ret;
00104 }
00105 /* function GetSolde
00106  * Purpose : give the balance of an account
00107  * 
00108  * parm : 
00109  *      -  connection
00110  *      - account
00111  *      - cond
00112  * gen :
00113  *      - none
00114  * return:
00115  *      - balance of the account
00116  *
00117  */ 
00118 function GetSolde($p_cn,$p_account,$p_cond="") {
00119   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select j_poste,sum(deb) as sum_deb, sum(cred) as sum_cred from 
00120           ( select j_poste, 
00121              case when j_debit='t' then j_montant else 0 end as deb, 
00122              case when j_debit='f' then j_montant else 0 end as cred 
00123           from jrnx join tmp_pcmn on j_poste=pcm_val 
00124               where  
00125             j_poste=$p_account
00126           ) as m group by j_poste ");
00127   $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00128   if ($Max==0) return 0;
00129   $r=pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00130 
00131   return $r['sum_deb']-$r['sum_cred'];
00132 }
